name: DeadlyAxemon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add up to 2 cards with [Knightmon] in their names among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Knightmon] or [Bagramon] in its name, it gets +2000 DP.
